ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER find that your usual number of drinks had much less effect on you than it once did?
With reference to the answer of question 1a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER find that you had to drink much more than you once did to get the effect you wanted?
With reference to the answer of question 2a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER drink as much as a fifth of liquor in one day, that would be about 20 drinks, or 3 bottles of wine, or as much as 3 six-packs of beer in a singly day?
With reference to the answer of question 3a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER increase your drinking because the amount you used to drink didn't give you the same effect anymore?
With reference to the answer of question 4a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER more than once want to stop or cut down on your drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 5a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER more than once TRY to stop or cut down on your drinking but found you couldn't do it?
With reference to the answer of question 6a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER have a period when you ended up drinking more than you meant to?
With reference to the answer of question 7a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER have a period when you kept on drinking for longer than you had intended to?
With reference to the answer of question 8a; did this happen in the last 12 months?

The next few questions are about the bad aftereffects of drinking that people may have when the effects of alcohol are wearing off. This includes the morning after drinking or in the first few days after stopping or cutting down. Did you ever have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep (where the effects of alcohol were wearing off)
With reference to the answer of question 9aa; did this happen in the last 12 months?
"" did you EVER find yourself shaking (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)?
With reference to the answer of question 9ab; did this happen in the last 12 months?
"" did you EVER feel anxious or nervous (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)?
With reference to the answer of question 9ac; did this happen in the last 12 months?
"" did you EVER feel sick to your stomach or vomit (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)?
With reference to the answer of question 9ad; did this happen in the last 12 months?
"" did you EVER feel more restless than is usual for you (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)?
With reference to the answer of question 9ae; did this happen in the last 12 months?
"" did you EVER find yourself sweating or your heart beating fast (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off?)
With reference to the answer of question 9af; did this happen in the last 12 months?
"" did you EVER See, feel, or hear things that weren't really there (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)?
With reference to the answer of question 9ag; did this happen in the last 12 months?
"" did you EVER have fits or seizures (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)?
With reference to the answer of question 9ah; did this happen in the last 12 months?
In your ENTIRE LIFE, did you EVER have very bad headaches (when the effects of alcohol were wearing off)?
With reference to the answer of question 9ai; did this happen in the last 12 months?

You just mentioned that you had experienced some bad physical aftereffects of drinking in the last 12 months. Were any of these bad aftereffects uncomfortable or upsetting to you or did they cause problems in your life - like at work or school or with family or friends?
With reference to the answer of question 9aj; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Take a drink or use any drug or medicine, other than aspirin, Advil or Tylenol, to GET OVER any of the bad aftereffects of drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 10a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Take a drink or use any drug or medicine other than aspirin, advil or Tylenol, to KEEP FROM having any of these bad aftereffects of drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 11a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Have a period when you spent a lot of time drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 12a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Have a period when you spent a lot of time being sick or getting over the bad aftereffects of drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 13a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Give up or cut down on activities that were important to you in order to drink- like work, school, or associating with friends or relatives?
With reference to the answer of question 14a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Give up or cut down on activites that you were interested in or that gave you pleasure in order to drink?
With reference to the answer of question 15a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Continue to drink even though you knew it was making you feel depressed, uninterested in things, or suspicious or distrustful of other people?
With reference to the answer of question 16a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Continue to drink even though you knew it was causing you a health prolem or making a health problem worse?
With reference to the answer of question 17a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Continue to drink even though you had experienced a prior blackout, that is, awakened the net day not being able to remember some of the things you did while drinking or after drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 18a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Have a period when your drinking or being sick from drinking often interfered with taking care of your home or family?
With reference to the answer of question 19a; did this happen in the last 12 months?

Have job or school troubles because of your drikning or being sick from drinking - like missing too much work, not doing your work well, being demoted or losing a job, or being suspended, expelled, or dropping out of school?
With reference to the answer of question 20a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
More than once drive a car or other vehicle WHILE you were drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 21a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
More than once ride in a car or other vehicle as a passenger WHILE the driver was drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 22a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
More than once drive a car, motorcycle, truck, boat, or other vehicle after hacing too much to drink?
With reference to the answer of question 23a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Get into situations while drinking or after drinking that increased your chances of getting hurt - like swimming, using machinery, or walking in a dangerous area or around heaving traffic?
With reference to the answer of question 24a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Contine to drink even though you knew it was causing your trouble with your family or friends?
With reference to the answer of question 25a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Get into physical fights while drinking or right after drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 26a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Get arrested, held at a police station, or have any other legal provlems because of your drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 27a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Find that you could drink much LESS than you once did to get the effect you wanted
With reference to the answer of question 29a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
Ride in a car as a passanger while you were drinking?
With reference to the answer of question 29a; did this happen in the last 12 months?
